name: ReaFrog
description:
"ReaFrog" is the classic frog-navigation game, Frogger, remade entirely within the audio editing software, Reaper.

The download features a portable install of Reaper that will boot up into the ReaFrog game project. If you already have Reaper installed, you probably won't be able to properly use the included ReaFrog.rpp file on your own, personal Reaper install as the necessary keybindings, extensions and hackery will not be configured correctly.

In fact it might be pretty tricky to actually play the game and we will be completely baffled if you actually succeed with opening the game. Let us know if you are 1/100.000 who manage to play it.

Step 1: Have a Mac.
Step 2: Open the Reaper folder, find the Reaper.app and open it.
Step 2b: Does that work or are there random errors? In that case, we are so sorry
Step 3: The Game file should now open. Close down the license window (or pay $60 if you want)
Step 4: Press Space to play the game, use the arrow keys to navigate
Step 5: Don't die
Step 6: ??????
Step 7: Profit

Made by Daniel Martin Nielsen and Marc Hasselbalch At the Nordic Game Jam 2023.
www.gminorscale.com
www.marchasselbalch.com
